body.p: Horse Stealing 4 years from Caldwell county. Sept term 1857. Recd Sept 29 1857.

Dunning has Behaved will and made a good Prisoner. and goes out to morrow Sunday with no way to get away from here only on foot. and wants me to get him A Pardon So he can go this Evening. If you feel Disposed to let him go It will greatly oblige

Caldwell Cir Ct
4 yrs. Penty
Miles Dunning
